tool.help:
**What it does**
fathmm: Functional Analysis through Hidden Markov Models
A tool for predicting the functional consequences of both coding variants, i.e. non-synonymous single nucleotide variants (nsSNVs), and non-coding variants
**Citation**
If you use this tool please cite:
Shihab HA, Gough J, Cooper DN, Day INM, Gaunt, TR. (2013). Predicting the Functional Consequences of Cancer-Associated Amino Acid Substitutions. Bioinformatics 29:1504-1510.
